title: Stranger in the Storm
description: Icarus is a vampire that lives undetected amongst humans. He has never yet found a human woman attractive but when he meets Ruth he knows something is different.But Icarus has two problems: firstly, if he makes love to Ruth she will also turn into a vampire, ending her human life - that is, if he doesn't kill her in the heat of the moment as most vampires do when in such close proximity to humans. Secondly, the Elders would never allow a human to keep on living if they knew the vampires existed...It seems Ruth is destined to die either way. What will Icarus do?This risque 10,000 word novella is the first installment in Calla Clarke's exciting erotic vampire romance series, 'The Icarus Trilogy'.WARNING: This book contains adult material!
author: Calla Clarke
